parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: WhitelistNetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the IP address whitelist. Valid values:

*   **Classic**: classic network in enhanced whitelist mode
*   **VPC**: virtual private cloud (VPC) in enhanced whitelist mode
*   **MIX**: standard whitelist mode

By default, this operation returns IP address whitelists of all network types.
